sources.title: Let's Live a Little
sources.description: Title: Let's Live a Little Summary: A harried, overworked advertising executive is being pursued romantically by one of his clients, a successful perfume magnate ... and his former fiancée. The latest client of the agency is ... Directed by: Richard Wallace Actors: Hedy Lamarr, Robert Cummings, Anna Sten Production Company: United California Productions Inc. Release Date: 23 May 1949 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A harried, overworked advertising executive is being pursued romantically by one of his clients, a successful perfume magnate ... and his former fiancée. The latest client of the agency is a psychiatrist and author of a new book. When the executive goes over to discuss the ad campaign, the psychiatrist turns out to be a woman. But what does he really need? Romance? Or analysis?

metadata.Plot: A harried, overworked advertising executive is being pursued romantically by one of his clients, a successful perfume magnate ... and his former fiancée. The latest client of the agency is a psychiatrist and author of a new book. When the executive goes over to discuss the ad campaign, the psychiatrist turns out to be a woman. But what does he really need? Romance? Or analysis?
metadata.Writer: Howard Irving Young, Edmund L. Hartmann, Albert J. Cohen
metadata.Actors: Hedy Lamarr, Robert Cummings, Anna Sten
